title: (x) San Francisco Chronicle - custom by Jim Parkinson
content:
Who designed the type for the SF Chronicle? It's excellent to my eyes both small and large. Sorry I can't post a sample, any Bay Area typophiles up for it?   
   
Thanks,   
Randy
author: aquatoad

comments.content:
[Jim Parkinson.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010230435/http:/typedesign.com/) And you're right - it _is_ excellent work. He did versions of Metro and   
Spartan, as well as the Section Head type, as far as I know.
